plot: Robert has been fired and it seems that his girl friend Evelyn wants to leave him. His friend and colleague Markus meets him in the evening in his office. What is Robert supposed to do? ...
title: Neue Schuhe
plot_es: Robert has been fired and it seems that his girl friend Evelyn wants to leave him. His friend and colleague Markus meets him in the evening in his office. What is Robert supposed to do? ...
